title: Development of Instructional Design Leadership Competencies in Higher Education Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in operating online education platforms and basic knowledge of organizational management
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen online learning design and leadership capabilities in language education, analyzing real-world cases across diverse organizational structures within enterprises, with collaboration required in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments.

learning_goals: Learners can establish instructional design leadership strategies by analyzing an organization's structural characteristics.
Learners can explain role differences in instructional design teams based on centralized/decentralized organizational structures.
Learners can develop and present an effective online learning design model through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
